name: Greek Deviled Eggs
author: Shyla Lane
summary: Combining feta cheese, balsamic vinegar, and fresh basil is a winning recipe for some delicious deviled eggs! Enjoy!
ingredients: ¾ cup crumbled feta cheese, or to taste
½ cup chopped fresh basil, or to taste
1 tablespoon ground black pepper, or to taste
directions: Place eggs in a saucepan; cover with water
Bring to a boil, remove from heat, and let eggs stand in hot water for 15 minutes
Remove eggs from hot water, cool under cold running water, and peel
Cut each egg in half lengthwise; place egg yolks in a bowl
Stir mayonnaise, feta cheese, basil, tomato, black olives, and balsamic vinegar together in a bowl; stir in mashed yolks
Spoon yolk mixture into a resealable plastic bag; snip off one corner of the bag
Place egg whites cut-side up on a serving platter
Pipe yolk mixture into egg whites
Season deviled eggs with black pepper; garnish with additional chopped basil and crumbled feta cheese
